Travel-Hotline.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Created RESTful API endpoints for querying and dispatching notifications and trip management operations.
Constructed a scalable back-end infrastructure, comprising modules, services, DTOs, entities, and controllers as part of the REST API design process.
Developed schemas using Prisma and PostgreSQL for efficient database design and management.
Utilized web technologies such as Jira for effective project management and Figma for mobile design.
Integrated web services like Google's location API to enhance the app’s geolocation-based features.
Logged technical documentation, writing comments and annotations, to ensure clarity and maintainability.
Utilized CI/CD pipelines to automate the deployment process and establish continuous integration.

Aquillius Corporation.title: Team Lead / R&D Intern
responsibilities: Led a cross-functional team, providing guidance towards successful product development.
Facilitated teamwork in producing engaging presentations and reports to communicate project status.
Conducted research and synthesized team insights to make informed decision-making.
Managed project budget effectively by maintaining a Build of Materials (BoM) list in MS Excel.
Employed ideation techniques, such as storyboarding, mind mapping, and persona development, to gain a deeper understanding of the target audience and streamline processes for the development phase.
achievements: Secured the $10,000 grand prize by impressing seven industry professionals in a pitch competition.
Ranked 1st in a popular vote for bringing the most innovative solution and presentation.

85c Bakery and Cafe.title: Shift Lead
responsibilities: Oversaw the daily operations and assigned tasks for efficient workflow.
Fostered a productive, team-oriented environment through clear communication, and hands-on leadership.
Trained new employees, equipping them with the skills and resources for long-term success.
Identified individual team members’ strengths and weaknesses to optimize team performance and offer targeted support.
Delivered detailed sales reports to upper management for performance analysis and strategic planning.
Diagnosed and resolved technical issues, ensuring uninterrupted store operations and system functionality.

KFC.title: Cashier
responsibilities: Handled customer transactions accurately and efficiently in a fast-paced environment.
Provided friendly and professional customer service, addressing guest inquiries and resolving complaints to ensure satisfaction.
Maintained cleanliness of the front counter and dining area to meet health and safety standards.
Assisted with daily cash reconciliation, ensuring till balance and reporting discrepancies to management.
Promoted new menu items and upsold products to increase sales and enhance customer experience.
Followed company procedures for food safety, cash handling, and customer service best practices.
